title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When I try clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus anymore. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
OB: Currently, clicking on the first Combo does not result in it taking focus.
EB: The focus caret should be in the first Combo with the label 'Host:' after clicking on it.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application 
2. Locate the first Combo labeled 'Host:' 
3. Click on the first Combo 
4. Verify that the focus caret is not in the first Combo
